infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app requires access to your health data to track your heart rate variability, sleep, activity, and other health metrics to help monitor your stress levels and overall well-being.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app requires access to write health data to track your health metrics and provide accurate stress monitoring.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app requires motion access to track your activity levels.
